law.catch_line: In addition to any other available remedy, a local jurisdiction may institute any appropriate action...

text.section:
Notwithstanding subsection (a) of this section, a local jurisdiction may not institute an action or proceeding to:
abate a transfer that has been completed; or
prevent the occupancy of a building, structure, or land involved in the transfer as a result of a violation of § 5-301 or § 5-302 of this article.
